title: 'FloatTensor' object has no attribute 'get_device'
body_html:
I was going through this example
http://pytorch.org/docs/notes/cuda.html

it seems one can use "get_device" to check the location of the tensor. but it only works if the tensor is on GPU, which calls for ugly "check attr" workaournds!
body_text:

http://pytorch.org/docs/notes/cuda.html

body:
I was going through this example
http://pytorch.org/docs/notes/cuda.html

it seems one can use "get_device" to check the location of the tensor. but it only works if the tensor is on GPU, which calls for ugly "check attr" workaournds!
